steps.name: Navigate to url:
BASE - Typing textbox by setValue function with value "******" and needClickOption is "true"
BASE - Typing textbox by setValue function with value "******" and needClickOption is "true"
BASE - Click general element
When I navigate to menu "Mobile App" with submenu "Mobile Editor"
Then I should see Mobile screen display
When I select tab list with name "Pages"
When I select tab name Pages with index 1
When I add new screen with name JIT022b
Then I should see the screen with name JIT022b display in list Pages
When I select screen with name JIT022b
When I select tab list with name "Layers"
When I open Search popup on item value "JIT022b" with index "1"
When I add item "Text" in Search popup to preview mobile editor
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "JIT008.Search.Components.Text"
When I select item value "Text" with index "1"
When I update field label "Text" of header "Text" with value "JITERA"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.Text.Content.JITERA"
When I select dropdown field label "Font Family" of header "Text" with value "Default"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.FontFamily.Default"
When I update field label "Size" of header "Text" with value "30"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.Size.30"
When I select dropdown field label "Font Weight" of header "Text" with value "normal"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.FontWeight.Normal"
When I select dropdown field label "Font Weight" of header "Text" with value "bold"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.FontWeight.Bold"
When I update field label "Line Height" of header "Text" with value "50"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.LineHeight.50"
When I update field label "Letter Spacing" of header "Text" with value "20"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.LetterSpacing.20"

When I update field label "Text" of header "Text" with value "JITERA new era in software development. New generation of coding, no code, save more time, bring idea to customer quickly and become valuable start-up!"
When I update field label "Letter Spacing" of header "Text" with value "0"
When I select field label "Text Align" of header "Text" with radio "Auto"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.Align.Auto"
When I select field label "Text Align" of header "Text" with radio icon has attribute aria-label "align-center"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.Align.Center"
When I select field label "Text Align" of header "Text" with radio icon has attribute aria-label "align-left"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.Align.Left"
When I select field label "Text Align" of header "Text" with radio icon has attribute aria-label "align-right"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.Align.Right"
When I select field label "Text Align" of header "Text" with radio icon has attribute value "justify"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.Align.Justify"
When I update field label "Text" of header "Text" with value "JITERA"
When I select the color for field label "Color" of header "Text" by inputting the hexcode value "FF0000"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.Color.RED"
Then I should see the value of color card with label "Color" of header "Text" is equal to "#FF0000"
When I turn on the toggle button label "Letter Spacing" of header "Text" with value "italic"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.Italic"
When I turn on the toggle button label "Letter Spacing" of header "Text" with value "underline"
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "MOBILE.JIT022b.Text.Underline"
